docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''Mysteries of the Mind,'' on Channel 5 at 8 tonight, is a slightly schizoid show.

headline.main: Review/Television; Treating Mental Illness With Drugs

docs.snippet: LEAD: ''Mysteries of the Mind,'' on Channel 5 at 8 tonight, is a slightly schizoid show.

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: An AIDS organization has charged that trials for experimental drugs at three medical schools in New York City have excluded the poor, members of minority groups and women, and praised one of the schools for taking remedial steps.
docs.snippet: LEAD: An AIDS organization has charged that trials for experimental drugs at three medical schools in New York City have excluded the poor, members of minority groups and women, and praised one of the schools for taking remedial steps.
